name: Ninja Mint Warrior
description:
Ninja Mint Warrior is an arcade endless running 2D game where you have to stand on the citron as long as you can.  Stay care there can be traps on your way !

Will you be able to beat your own score ?

  • CONTROLS

Direction : Left joystick

Jump : A button

  • CREDITS

Programming: Paul THIBAULT

Art: Valentine COLLET

Game design: Erwan COCHON
